trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Veeam Backup And Replication:data.ResultBackupPerVM['{#ID}'].avg(300)}<0 and {Template Veeam Backup And Replication:data.ResultBackupPerVM['{#ID}'].avg(300)}<2

No data for VM {#NAME} in backup job {#JOBNAME}

dependency.name: Non-correct JSON data is received in ResultBackupPerVM
